article: How to Make a Girl's Hormones Rise over Text
intro: If youâ€™ve been texting a girl you like for a little while now, you might be wondering how you can amp up the sexual tension between you two.

points.name: â€œYou have such a beautiful smile.â€

steps.subtitle: If youâ€™re still feeling things out, stick to things  or her facial features. If thereâ€™s already been a bit of sexual tension between you two, you might try  or her physical features. Flattery goes a long way, and hearing something nice might just get her thinking about you in a different way. Try something like:
sub-points: â€œI like how smart (spontaneous, adventurous, intelligent...) you are!â€

points.name: â€œI had a dream about you last night.â€

steps.title: Build up a little mystery with this text.

steps.title: Send her this one late at night to see what sheâ€™s doing.
